guardian.name: [IT] Guardian
guardian.description: [IT] I'll show you everything before I act
guardian.detail: [IT] Every action requires your explicit approval. Full control.

partner.name: [IT] Partner
partner.description: [IT] I'll handle the routine, check on the important stuff
partner.detail: [IT] Routine tasks run autonomously. Novel or high-stakes actions need approval.

alter_ego.name: [IT] Alter Ego
alter_ego.description: [IT] I'll handle everything, interrupt only when it matters
alter_ego.detail: [IT] Most users start with Partner and move here within a few weeks.
